The game was tied at 102 at the end of regulation and at 112 after the first overtime
Post-Match Reflections: DeRozan took over after that with a 3-pointer and a trio of step-back jumpers that stunned Miami and left the Heat winless in three overtime games on the road this season
The Heat are 4-7 without Jimmy Butler this season
Sacramento is playing with a lot more heart and effort under Christie than it did the final two weeks under former coach Mike Brown
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaime Jaquez Jr. had a triple-double with 16 points, 12 rebounds and 10 assists for Miami
Tyler Herro scored 26 but was called for a costly 8-second violation toward the end of the fourth quarter
